ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm, I think both of those would likely HT me for far more that a bub or 2 at 35th???  Wouldn t they?  Heck I don t know, if that s all HT does at that level
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm, I think both of those would likely HT me for far more that a bub or 2
at 35th??? Wouldn't they? Heck I don't know, if that's all HT does at that
level it is hardly fearsome in an outdoor situation.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 3:19 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine


probably for about a bub or 2 of health... Just think of how the king HT's
in sol b or lord in guk. Just a hunch

-Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: January 12, 2001 5:12 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine


How much does he Harmtouch for? That's the primary concern that has kept me
from going to get this one. I have little experience with shadowknights
past about 15th level so I have no idea how much their HT does.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Windleaf Mistsong [mailto:windleaf@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 2:14 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Tambourine


At 11:10 AM 1/12/01 -0500, you wrote:

>Tamborine: Yes, I'm 54 and still 2 coins shy of that thing! I've been
>lugging that silly box around forever it seems. Finally a druid foraged the
>EJ one for me during the raid on the dragon there this weekend. No failed
>raiders up in Kaesora last night though. Still need to take out a scorp as
>well, keep trying to talk the group into bagging one on our way into
Howling
>Stones but they've been in a rush to get in everytime so far. I never log
in
>and hang out, consequently I have a bank full of old armor and dropped
>spells and assorted stuff that could be sold or traded. If I don't log the
>bard in expressly to go do something, we go play twinks or move stuff
>between characters and then go do something. (4 accounts between the 2 of
>us, now that's addiction!)
>
>Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
>Excalibur, Xegony

I got my Overthere coin solo at 35. I'm sure you'd have no problems at 54.

I did get a SOW off of someone, invis'd myself, found a Scrouger and DOT'd
him. Reinvis'd myself and had him follow me out of the chasm. He will DT
you, and that happened to be when I was passing another scorpion, but that
actually made it easier as then I just charm-kited once I got them both out
of the Chasm.

---Windleaf
